name: Desire Gambling House/欲望赌馆
description:
• This is a relaxed leisure puzzle game, simple 21-point play, reversing the crisis with only 101! Even hold the beauty back!
    There are many different types of beauty rivals, such as the girl-next-door, uniform, Lolita, Royal lady and so on.

  • Game play：
    Game play: classic 21-point card game, you can win all the clothes of beautiful women!
    After all the beautiful women's clothes have been lost,You can also buy her, she will come back to your room with you!


  • No job, no money to pay rent, you're on the verge of despair; this is a gambling house that you've never been to, with only 101 on your body, can you create a miracle? Even hold the beauty back!

  • Money and beauty are men's romance! You don't have to be merciful even if your opponent is a beautiful woman. What? Has the beauty lost all her money yet?
    She even offered to bet on her clothes! Can you hold it?
